rows.label: qev013303_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, it's [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0002
rows.name: So it was YOU telling me to head south![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0003
rows.name:
I thought I recognized that voice on the other end
of the line![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev013303_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bates if he's hurt.

rows.label: qev013303_JNK0020
rows.name: Chide

rows.label: qev013303_SEL0021
rows.name: Reprimand Bates for acting irresponsibly.

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0004
rows.name: Fine, thanks to you. Not a scratch on me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0024
rows.name:
I had no idea there was a Nopon caravan so close.
Little furballs saved my neck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0005
rows.name:
They let me hide here while the black Skell was looking
for me. Eventually it gave up and left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0006
rows.name:
Any other day I'd have a comeback, but right now,
I know I'm alive because of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0007
rows.name:
If you hadn't steered me here, I... Well, I'd be a nasty
stain on the foot of that black Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0008
rows.name:
Uh-oh. That's your radio, right?
Wonder if it's Raleigh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0009
rows.name: Raleigh here. Do you copy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0010
rows.name:
Peter said you went in to evacuate Bates.
Did you find the rook alive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hey, after all I've been through, I'm a veteran now!
Also, hey, Raleigh. Yeah, I'm fine. Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0012
rows.name:
Glad to hear it. Now if you're ready, I've got your next
assignment, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0013
rows.name:
I made contact with Corwin.
He's in Banshee Cave over in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0014
rows.name:
That was all he could tell me before he started taking
fire. Bastards were right on top of him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'm counting on you to see him back to New LA with
no extra holes in him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev013303_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree to help no matter what.

rows.label: qev013303_JNK0040
rows.name: Resist

rows.label: qev013303_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that you're not confident you can pull it off.

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0016
rows.name: That means a lot. You're as reliable as Corwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0017
rows.name:
Just promise me you'll keep your eyes peeled for that
black Skell, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0018
rows.name:
Look, I know it's not an easy assignment, and I won't
ask you to make promises you can't keep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0019
rows.name:
Just know that you're all we've got, okay?
We're trusting you with this, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0020
rows.name:
And sorry to keep leaving everything to you.
It really burns me up, but the best thing I can do now
is head home and stay out of your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0021
rows.name:
We all joined this team out of respect for Corwin.
Without him, there wouldn't even BE a team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0022
rows.name:
If he dies, the team dies with himâ€”no matter how
many of us survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013303_MSG0023
rows.name: So promise me you'll do everything you can, okay?[ST:wait ]
